DdMd::AnglePotential Class Reference
Angle Potentials

Detailed Description

An AnglePotential calculates angle forces and energies for a parent Simulation.

Definition at line 29 of file ddMd/potentials/angle/AnglePotential.h.

#include <AnglePotential.h>
